title: To Live and Love In L.A.
description: He's back. In this follow-up to the acclaimed TO LIVE AND DRINK IN L.A., Shawn Michals, notorious imbiber of life and cocktails, returns to tackle a subject that has both inspired and confounded some of the greatest thinkers throughout history: LOVE.TO LIVE AND LOVE IN L.A. tracks Shawn as he navigates the amorous waters of a city teeming with both angels and devils. These passionate adventures involve fellow artists, wild ones and even a would-be zombie. Along the way, Shawn is questioned about everything from his sanity to his sexuality to his advice on how to seduce a cougar (or vice-versa).While indulging in this romantic odyssey, Shawn begins to question whether he will ever find The One. After all, falling in love and accepting love involves not only a healthy degree of courage, but a healthy degree of craziness. Feeling courageous? Feeling crazy? Chances are you'll love this book.Here's looking at you, kid...
author: Ben Peller
